text:
March 19t 1969
Mr. David C. Stewart
Director of Special Projects
Corporation for Public Broadcasting
1250 Connecticut Avenue, N. W.
Suite 630
Washington, D. C. 20036
Dear Mr. Stewart:
Enclosed is a copy of the annual NAEB Directory and
Yearbook of Educational Broadcasting which includes
a complete listing ofall educational radio and teleÂ¬
vision stations in the United States.
Earlier we supplied the Corporation with a mailing
list of educational radio stations. In our office
we have a complete list of these stations on address-
o-graph mailing plat4s. If it would be helpful, we
will be happy to run a set of these addresses for
you.
Sincerely,
Enclosure
Lucinda K. Landreth
Administrative Assistant
